Class EncoderEntryMapper<K, V, T extends Map.Entry<K,V>>

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.cache.impl.EncoderEntryMapper<K,V,T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function<T,T>, UnaryOperator<T>, EncodingFunction<T>, InjectiveFunction<T,T>
public class EncoderEntryMapper<K, V, T extends Map.Entry<K,V>> extends Object implements EncodingFunction<T>
Function that uses an encoder to converter entries from the configured storage format to the requested format.
